sections.general: electrician professional summary technically sophisticated aviation electricianâ with 20 years of experience on large-scale electronic systems, troubleshooting, installation, calibration, and maintenance repair within the united states navy.â in-depth knowledge of aircraft, avionics, electrical and electronic technologies.â consistent record of achievement in project management, dramatically improving system operating efficiency and reliability.â productive team contributor successfully delivering concurrent projects under tight deadlines.
